title: Can the details of the Wrightsville Beach Police investigation that resulted in two officers getting demoted, and one resigning be obtained thorough a Freedom of Information Act request?
text:
Here's a link to a story that should answer your question.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20120221/ARTICLES/120229961/1177?Title=2-Wrightsville-Beach-officers-reprimanded-1-quits
